name: The Bali Dream Villa Seminyak

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Bali Dream Villa in June this year for 8 nights. The staff and managment were so accomadating and freindly. The villa's are great value and had a real indonesian feel. For the price of having your own quiet, private Villa you wont be disapointed.
reviews.title: Great staff, great value, will be back to stay again!!!

reviews.text: A big thanks to the Staff and Manager Budi
reviews.title: A lovely 1 week stay

reviews.text: We booked this hotel waaaaay in advance (6 months) as they were having a great promo. Hey, who doesn't like good deals right?
reviews.title: serenity
Lovely place, great food
reviews.text: We stayed there for a week and they had lovely rooms, 2 on each of the floors. It was very cosy and homely I would say. The beds are comfy and I slept like a baby every night! The mozzie net was helpful to keep the mozzies out and they even provided and electric mozzie coil device. We switched it on the entire week! Oh, be sure to bring travel adapters coz theirs was totally different but no worries if you happen to forget. You may ask the reception and they will gladly provide you with one or two.

The private pool isnt that big enough to fit all 8 of us so only the guys played games in the pool when we were not sightseeing or shopping. We didnt really use the tanning chairs as we were out most of the time.
reviews.title: What a dream .loved the place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I think all the previous reviews have been honest and fair. I wont even bother adding pictures of my own as again the previous reviewers have given a good all round view of Bali Dream Villas ( BDV ). I truly cannot fault the staff. All of them cant do enough to make you feel welcome and help in anyway. Everyone from the manager to the gardeners ! Location has been correctly described by others. It's a nice quiet location , down an unassuming street and close by to everything. Unless you like to have your own transport ,I really recommend taxi's ...whether it's getting into Kuta or Seminyak ..the beach etc...it's only like 20k a trip...dirt cheap. Better still the courtesy buses from BDV are great too. Villas are private and well equipped. A few have mentioned the fact the sun doesn't shine much on the garden and pool. I can see where they are coming from..but perhaps we was lucky in our villa..we had sun from 10.30 pm up until 4.30. Yes the pools are a bit fresh :) ... but clean. for a chilled week in your own private pool villa... BDV get a YES vote from me. Now ...the little downsides. Our particular villa just needed a little bit of attention here and there. Cupboard doors need attending as one was nearly falling off. Some plug sockets didn't look safe at all. It isn't really suitable for home cooking although there is a small kitchenette and some basic utensils. Breakfast really wasn't all that. We particularly like breakfast, but if you after a ' big varied and hearty'' one, this isn't the place..not enough choice. This needs to be addressed. No bar. No dog problems but Cats are problematic whereby you can come out in the morning and find 1 or 2 sleeping on the sofa and chairs. So invariably we would ask the cleaners to pay a bit ''more attention '' to the living area. Free water bottles are not in abundance. WiFi is free but the signal was weak and crashed sometimes. But we coped. So the downsides are not bad...but if those little things were looked at it would make a world of difference. Would I come back ?,, I guess so...I would not deter anyone from staying here.
reviews.title: I would return and recommend ....

reviews.text: We started out the first couple of nights of our honeymoon at the Bali dream villa resort in seminyak. This was the most expensive hotel we had booked for our trip and it did not disappoint. We were promptly and easily picked up from the airport and then welcomed by their great staff upon our arrival. Our hotel room was beautiful and had a fairly large private pool. While the hotel is not in a central location they offer hourly shuttle service to kuta, seminyak and legion. There are many staff members and they are very attentive to the needs of the guests. Excellent experience, would highly recommend this hotel especially to honeymooners.
reviews.title: Sweet Stay in Seminyak

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from a weeks stay at bali dream villa 1. Had a great experience there and the staff were super helpful eg. arranging flower decorations and a petal filled bath. Many thanks to Era who was extremely attentive to our needs and making our trip more enjoyable.
reviews.title: Super Accomodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Best regards and we would have no hesitation staying there again in the future or recommending the property to our friends.
reviews.title: Beautiful stay, small improvements needed, but would definitely return!

reviews.text: Overall I’d give this a place a 7.8/10. It is located about a 5 – 7 minute drive from the beach.. in the afternoon or evening the drive can take you 15 minutes or more. The traffic is horrendous at all hours except early morning. We didn’t mind having to get a taxi to and from the resort – the taxis are extremely cheap in Bali – you can drive for an hour on $20.. no exaggeration. So to the beach it was just $2.50.
reviews.title: A Place Home from Home and more

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was some time ago that i stayed in this hotel however i still remember it as one of my favorite places. The hotel is beautiful and has an incredible swimming pool with amazing natural views. It was one of the more expensive places that we stayed in Bali but it was worth every penny. Clean/stylish rooms, lovely food, close to the town of Ubud. If i went back to Bali I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

reviews.text: A wonderful start to our first trip to Bali. The villa complex is nice, well kept and secure. A very professional and genuinely friendly staff that would do anything for you! The villa itself was amazing. We were upgraded from 3 to 4-bedroom villa for a bigger pool. The accommodation is reasonably well kept and the housekeeping was fantastic. The beds were so comfy...foam mattress...and the mossie nets worked a treat. semi open bathrooms are interesting but well suited to the villa set-up.
reviews.title: A Bali Dream Indeed

reviews.text: Shuttle into Kuta, Legion and Seminyak was a godsend. We enjoyed being away from the bustle of main Seminyak and reveled in the peace and seclusion the complex offered. They also arranged transport to Jambarin and to our next destination in Ubud. ages is a fountain of information and an asset to the hotel.
reviews.title: Home away from Home

reviews.text: We'll be back next year!!!!

reviews.text: Liaised with the staff there as it was my bf's surprise bday trip. They were SO helpful and made this trip so special for us. All the staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Service was top notch!
reviews.title: Surprise bday trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool villa was beautiful, however I wished that the sun was shining on the pool for most of the day instead of only for an hour a day. The food wasn't amazing but you can always go into town for better bites.
reviews.title: First trip to Bali

reviews.text: This was our first trip to Bali and we stayed in one bedroom villa at Bali Dream Villa 1 for 3 nights.
reviews.title: Luxury!

reviews.text: I would rate the villa above average but not excellent. The best part of this villa is the service. Everyone in the villa was nice and friendly which help us settle well. Breakfast was good and I like the mie goreng especially. Although there are limited variety but it is more than enough for us for morning as we are not big eater. Our driver, Ariana was brilliant. He is the star of the trip. We booked him for a day tour and he basically drove us to most places that he possibly could while not rushing us. Really worth the money we paid for.
reviews.title: Simply Amazing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For the villa, there are goods and bads. We had one of our best candle light dinner in our own villa. Table was nicely setup, pool with full of flowers and candles around it. The food was above our expectation and we would definitely go back to this restaurant if it is here in Perth. The pool is good size and clean as well. There are a few downside. Bed was not that comfy and the air conditional is not cold at all which is very bad for hot weather in Bali. There are annoying wild cat around as well. We didn't use the kitchen at all but we found the can opener was badly rusted (please replace it ASAP), otherwise others were fine.
reviews.title: Nice masseuse and receptionist
